263342.<speed=0>\n『カスタム衣装の登録』の説明です。\n<br>\n施設の人:
This is an explanation of "Register Outfit". You can register an outfit to be worn by a person at the facility. A My Town Glamour
Ticket is required to register an outfit, which will be consumed when the registration is completed. The registered costumes can be
set as the common costume for all the people in My Town. However, costumes that do not match the gender cannot be worn. Please note
that equipment that is not registered in the Fashion Catalog cannot be used as a costume.

263343.施設の人に着せる衣装を 登録できます。\n登録には マイタウン施設コーデ券が 必:
By using a My Town Glamour Ticket, you can
register an outfit for My Town NPCs. The ticket
will be consumed when finishing.

263344.マイタウン施設コーデ券を 持っていません。\nカスタム衣装の登録や変更には\nマ:
I do not have a My Town Glamour Ticket. You
must have a My Town Glamour Ticket to register
or change your custom outfit.

263345.衣装の モデルになる人を\n選んでください。:
Choose someone to be the model for the
costume.

263346.おしゃれカタログに 登録されていない 装備品は\n衣装として使うことが できませ:
Equipment that is not registered in the
Fashion Catalog cannot be used as a costume.
Please use other equipment.

263347.この衣装を 着ている人が 装備できない\n装備品が 含まれています。\n他の装備:
This outfit contains equipment that the wearer
cannot equip. Please set up another piece of
equipment.

263348.衣装が 変更されていません。\n編集をキャンセルしますか？\n<yesno2>\:
The outfit has not been changed. Do you want
to cancel the edit?
<yesno2>
<close>

263349.性別専用の装備品が 含まれています。\n性別が合わない人には 着せられなくなりま:
Gender-specific equipment is included. If you
are not a gender specific person, you will not
be able to wear it.
<yesno>
<close>

263351.登録された衣装は 共通の衣装として\nモデル以外の どの施設の人の衣装としても\:
The registered costumes can be used as a common costume for any other person in the facility, except for the model, who cannot
wear a costume that does not match her gender. You may use a glamour ticket to register this costume. May I?

263352.衣装の登録に 必要な素材が 足りません。: I need more materials to register a costume.

271993.その名前では 登録できません。\n他の名前を 設定してください。:
The name cannot be registered. Please set
another name.

272394.この衣装を 記録した状態に\n戻しますか？\n<yesno>\n<close>:
Would you like to return this outfit to the
state in which it was recorded?
<yesno>
<close>

272486.衣装のモデルにするための 施設の人が\nいないので 衣装登録できません。\n先に:
I can't register a costume because there is no one at the facility to use as a model for the costume. Please register a person from your
facility first.

272857.元の色の場合は ツヤを変更できません。\n元のツヤに戻りますが よろしいですか？:
The gloss cannot be changed for the original
color. Is it OK if we return to the original
luster?
<yesno><close>

272888.貴重なアイテムの ツヤめきペイントで\nツヤを変更した部位が 変更されています。:
I changed the glossy paint of a valuable item and now the glossy paint has been changed. The glossy setting of the place where the glossy
paint was restored, the place where the equipment was removed, and the place where the equipment was changed to an equipment whose
color cannot be changed will be lost.

272979.衣装が 変更されていません。\n衣装名だけを 変えたい場合は ひとつ前の\n『衣:
The outfit has not been changed. If you want
to change only the outfit name, please change
it in the previous "Rename
Outfit" section.

312201.<%sM_Ticket>を １こ使って\nこの見た目を カスタムドレスに\n登録:
May I use one <%sM_Ticket> to register this
look for a custom dress?
<yesno2>
<close>

312202.<speed=0>\n<color_yellow>\n「カスタムドレスの登録」の:
Register a custom dress". You can register a custom dress for your private concierge by selecting one of the items in the
Fashion Catalog. However, please note that some items are only available if they are registered in the Fashion Catalog. Please note
that you can only change outfits once per glamour ticket, and the glamour ticket will be consumed when you make a decision. Please note
that you can only change the outfit once with one glamour ticket, and the glamour ticket will be consumed when you make a decision.
Please note that when you leave the Private Concierge, your registered custom dresses will also be lost.

313374.おしゃれカタログに 登録されていない 装備品は\n衣装として使うことが できませ:
Equipment that is not registered in the
Fashion Catalog cannot be used as a costume.
Please use other equipment.

314251.カスタムドレスを 登録しました！\n<br>\n<color_yellow>\n:
You have registered a custom dress! You can wear your registered custom dresses from the "Change Dresses" menu
in the "Teach Yourself How to Behave" section.

314252.カスタムドレスを 変更しました！\n<br>\n<color_yellow>\n:
Custom Dresses have been changed! You can wear your registered custom dresses from "Teach yourself how to
behave".

315082.カスタムドレスの編集を やめますか？\n<yesno2>\n<close>:
Do you want to stop editing your custom dress?
<yesno2>
<close>

315083.カスタムドレスの内容に 変更があるため\n現在の見た目を 上書き登録します。:
Overwrites the current look and feel of the
custom dress since it has been changed.

315084.一度 決定すると 戻すことはできず\n<%sM_Ticket>は なくなります。:
Once you have made a decision, it cannot be
reversed and the <%sM_Ticket> is gone. Are you
sure you want to register?
<yesno2>
<close>
